SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_UMHS_INTERACTIONBATCH_GETSITES
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: retrieves that MIMED interaction batch sites.
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: UM Dev
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL: CREATE FUNCTION DBO.USR_UFN_UMHS_INTERACTIONBATCH_GETSITES (@BATCHINTERACTIONID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER) RETURNS TABLE AS RETURN (SELECT ID, SITEID FROM DBO.USR_UMHS_INTERACTIONBATCHSITE WHERE BATCHINTERACTIONID = @BATCHINTERACTIONID)
